code: import React from'react';import{useParams,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Container,Typography,Paper,Button,Box}from'@mui/material';import{format}from'date-fns';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ItineraryDetail(){const{id}=useParams();const navigate=useNavigate();const itineraries=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('itineraries')||'[]');const itinerary=itineraries.find(i=>i.id===Number(id));if(!itinerary){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{children:"Itinerary not found"});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{maxWidth:"md",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{sx:{p:3,mt:4},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",gutterBottom:true,children:itinerary.destination}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"subtitle1",color:"textSecondary",children:[format(new Date(itinerary.startDate),'MMM dd, yyyy')," -",format(new Date(itinerary.endDate),'MMM dd, yyyy')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{mt:3,mb:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",onClick:()=>navigate(`/edit/${id}`),sx:{mr:2},children:"Edit Itinerary"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outlined",onClick:()=>navigate('/itineraries'),children:"Back to List"})]})]})});}export default ItineraryDetail;
